summary.para: [The feature associated with this page, DirectShow, is a legacy feature. It has been superseded by MediaPlayer and . MediaPlayer and IMFMediaEngine have been optimized for Windows 10 and Windows 11. Microsoft strongly recommends that new code use MediaPlayer and IMFMediaEngine instead of DirectShow, when possible. Microsoft suggests that existing code that uses the legacy APIs be rewritten to use the new APIs if possible.]
Specifies how the decoder reproduces dual mono audio. This enumeration is used with the AVDecAudioDualMonoReproMode property.

member.name: eAVDecAudioDualMonoReproMode.eAVDecAudioDualMonoReproMode_STEREO
member.summary: Output channel 1 (Ch1) to the left speaker and channel 2 (Ch2) to the right speaker.

member.name: eAVDecAudioDualMonoReproMode.eAVDecAudioDualMonoReproMode_LEFT_MONO
member.summary: Output Ch1 to the left and right speakers.

member.name: eAVDecAudioDualMonoReproMode.eAVDecAudioDualMonoReproMode_RIGHT_MONO
member.summary: Output Ch2 to the left and right speakers.

member.name: eAVDecAudioDualMonoReproMode.eAVDecAudioDualMonoReproMode_MIX_MONO
member.summary: Mix Ch1 and Ch2 and output the mix to the left and right speakers.
